# dbt-cloud Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account_id` (Number) Account identifier for your DBT Cloud implementation
- `token` (String) API token for your DBT Cloud

### Optional

- `host_url` (String) URL for your DBT Cloud deployment
